item.title: MS … NOW? As MSNBC Rebrands, a $20 Million Effort to Avoid Confusion.
item.description: After three decades, the MSNBC brand will be retired on Nov. 15. The network has called in Rachel Maddow to help viewers make the transition.

item.title: Small Businesses Gear Up for Tariff Fight at Supreme Court
item.description: Companies that sell diamonds, plant sensors and wine all have one thing in common: They are weighing in against tariffs in a consequential case.

item.title: Dick Cheney: A Life in Pictures
item.description: The former vice president helped shaped the role of the United States around the world.

item.title: Bold Assassinations Are Grim ‘Reality Check’ in Mexico’s Cartel Fight
